dialogs.npcText:
Ohh heheheh. 
 *The monkey is engrossed in filling orders for sushi and doesnt see you.*

Eeek eeek! 
 *The monkey looks up and yells, seems he doesnt like you cutting the line.*

Grrrrr! 
 *He reaches and grabs a knife, cutting off the head of a fish in one swift stroke. He proceeds to ignore you.*
dialogs.firstText: [1] All right, I get the message.

dialogs.npcText: *The monkey is continuing to make meals, ignoring you entirely.*
